attributes.action: Act now, against dangerous driving in our area!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This petition is to endorse speed bumps or speed cameras on Higher Road, Urmston, Manchester.  Dangerous and inconsiderate driving is causing great concern to the residents of our neighbourhood and this needs to be addressed immeadiately! This area has many elderly residents aswell as children and parents are becoming increasing concerned with their safety. There has already been two deaths on this road, the most recent being in the last two weeks. Your urgent response would be greatly appreciated.
